title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5317.17 - Database access
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5317.17 - Database access

State Regulations

The MCS shall not have a built-in facility in which a
gaming facility patron or employee can bypass the system auditing to modify the
database directly. Gaming facilities shall maintain secure access
control. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5317.17

Adopted

New

York State Register November 16, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 46, eff. 11/16/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
